mapper.select: select ID, ORDERID, STORAGEID, BASKET, RESOLVEBASKET, SHIPBASKETHEAD, TYPE, FLAG, CONTENT, ORDERTIME, GROUPID, PICKOPER, PICKTIME, RESOLVEOPER, RESOLVETIME, SHIPOPER, SHIPTIME, CREATEOPER, CREATTIME, OPER, OPERTIME, PRODUCTID, PICKEDNUM, PRINTNUM from DB_SHIPTASK where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
